# Overview


The IDFG telemetry package itself isn't on CRAN so it needs to be loaded from the GitHub remote using the following code:

```{r, eval=FALSE}

install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("EliFelts/IDFGtelemetry")

```

Now load the packages we'll need. 

```{r setup, eval=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library(IDFGtelemetry)
library(tidyverse)
library(arrow)


```
